context
Beheaded on the orders of the Queen of Hearts during a coup in a timeline that was later erased.
Mentioned as deceased prior to the movie's events.
Mentioned as deceased; possibly killed by Lady Tremaine according to dialogue implications.
Skull shown on screen implying a death in the past.
Murdered during an armed bank robbery committed by the French 75 revolutionary group.
Killed in a shootout with a far-right militia after freeing Willa.
Shot dead by Willa after she lured him into a car crash.
Fatally gassed and cremated by the secret society he sought to join.
Summarily executed by Lockjaw using information provided by Perfidia.
Dies of wounds after killing Hogwood and his men; sees a vision of his wife before passing.
Bitten and turned into a vampire; explicitly revealed to be alive (undead) in the post-credits scene.
Turned into a vampire by Mary; revealed to have survived the sunlight in the post-credits scene.
Staked by Smoke at her own request after being bitten, to prevent her turning.
Sacrifices herself by allowing herself to be burned alive to kill a vampire.
Killed by Remmick; later revived as a vampire and incinerated by sunlight.
Sacrificed himself to be eaten by vampires to allow others to escape.
Turned into a vampire by Remmick and subsequently incinerated by the sunrise.
Staked by Smoke and incinerated by the rising sun.
Killed by Smoke in the final confrontation.
Killed by vampires; revived and later incinerated by sunlight.
Neck bitten out by Remmick; revived as vampire and later killed.
Killed by Remmick off-screen; revived as vampire and later incinerated.
Mass casualty event where all remaining vampires (except Mary and Stack) were incinerated by the sunrise.
Multiple members of Hogwood's group shot by Smoke during the final confrontation.
Ambushed and assassinated in her car; later revealed to be killed by her colleague Nix.
Executed by JD Byrne after being caught and revealing the deception.
Killed during the shootout/chase sequence when Nix's crew was cornered.
